name: backup-notion-db
description: Creates file-based backups (JSON and CSV) of a Notion database
author: Claude Code
notes: Creates timestamped JSON backup with full data and metadata
Creates timestamped CSV backup for easy viewing in spreadsheet apps
Backups are saved to ./backups/ directory in the current working directory
The database must be shared with your Notion integration
For Notion-to-Notion backups, use Notion's built-in duplicate feature (â‹¯ menu > Duplicate)
